info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Warren, northeastern Fulton and northwestern Saratoga Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edinburg, or 20 miles northeast of Gloversville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Lake George Village, Edinburg, Northville, Lake Luzerne-Hadley, Lake Luzerne Campground, Day Center, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Hadley, Thurman, Lake George, Stony Creek, Harrisburg, Thurman Station, Fairchilds Corners, Big Hollow, Fish House, Tenantville, Fourth Lake and Conklingville. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 21 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern and east central New York.
